data.title: Famous Pittsburgh Penguins Player Appearances & Speakers
data.meta_description: Sports Speakers 360 can book famous Pittsburgh Penguins players for upcoming corporate events! Call now to learn about Pittsburgh Penguins appearances.
data.text: The Pittsburgh Penguins were founded in 1967. The team has won three Stanley Cup titles. The Penguins play in the Atlantic Division with the New Jersey Devils, New York Islanders, New York Rangers and Philadelphia Flyers. Among their most famous players include Mario Lemieux, Ron Francis, Paul Coffey, Jaromir Jagr and Larry Murphy.
